Name: The Mar'tu
Details: Literally translated into 'the way of the knife', the Mar'tu is a strict doctrine followed by many of the Autocracy's members, which derives from the tradition of knife fighting in the deserts of the Vel'gr. Strictly speaking it refers to the Arauts personal and BattleMech hand to hand fighting techniques, but its core principles are shared into many of the Autocracy's policies.
